name: Street Cop 3D
description:
When you're a cop walking the beat, the choices you make will stop the serious crime.

Everyone is a suspect and no one is spared a scan from your watchful eye. If a citizen is acting sus, don't be afraid to check their id and ask them questions. But be careful, a chase could break out at any time and you must react with speed and action or the criminal will escape.

Always be on the lookout for kidnappers, bank robbers, and of course the mafia who are lurking around every corner. Street Cop 3D is all about how you handle everyday situations involving real security issues. Do you have what it takes to drive crime out of the city and fight for justice?

Street Cop 3D Features:
- Awesome tools to be unlocked
- Bonus levels with extra challenges
- New areas of the city to police
